title: Argonaut Data Query Implementation Guide
introduction: The Argonaut Project is a joint project of major US EHR vendors to advance industry adoption of modern, open interoperability standards. For further information, see [About the Argonaut Project](http://argonautwiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Main_Page/Background). This Implementation Guide provides the specifications for basic access to EHR data. See the The [full list of Argonaut Specifications](http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut). Note that this implementation guide is based on [the DSTU2 version of FHIR](http://hl7.org/fhir/DSTU2).

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
